summary: These are the resources from Phitts Oblivion mod Sheogorad - Forsaken Isles ALPHA, a remake of the Morrowind region Sheogorad in the North of Vvardenfell
descriptionHtml:
[color=#ff0000][size=3][b]None of these resources or parts of them may be used in paid mods[/b][/size][/color]

=========================
Phitt's Sheogorad Resource - Part One

Modder's Resource
=========================

By Phitt

Converted by Tamira

=========================
These are the resources from Phitt's Oblivion mod "Sheogorad - Forsaken Isles ALPHA", a remake of the Morrowind region Sheogorad in the North of Vvardenfell


You can find the original file here:
http://www.nexusmods.com/oblivion/mods/37329/?

=========================

Phitt gave me permission to convert and upload the resources that are included in his great mod.
There is a huge amount of resources so I decided to split it in several parts.
I will upload the parts as soon as they are done, which may take some time as converting (and testing) is a very time-consuming job.

I had to leave out all meshes that are based on vanilla Oblivion meshes so there are not all objects from the Oblivion mod included in this one.

=========================

Some of the objects that are included in Part one:

Ashlander huts (yurts) with interiors
Paper lanterns
Ashlander/Vvardenfell plants and dead trees
Ashlander/Vvardenfell rocks

Mushrooms in all sizes
More plants and flowers
Stronghold
Animated Cliffracer

and many more ... discover yourself!

Plants and trees are not animated.
=========================

Have a look at my friend Antiscamp's WIP mod "Azura's Watch" where he used many of these models already and made excellent use of them:

http://frontierskyrim.wordpress.com/

=========================

Important:
Read the included "Sheogorad Terms Of Use" and give credits as requested there
Read the included original "Sheogorad Readme" for more details

=========================
Tools Used:
=========================

Nifskope
NifUtils by Skyfox

=================
Permissions:
=================

This is a modders resource.You may use the files for your own mods as long as you give credit to the authors (see above and below) and you do not charge money for it.
Please link back to this resource when you use it in your mod.

You may use this resource in Skyrim Special Edition too. All files should work without problems.

Do not upload to other sites.

=================
Credits:
=================

Phitt - Models/Textures

Read the included original "Sheogorad Readme" for more details

author: Phitt and Tamira
